# Unit Text Analysis

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(SnowballC)
library(kableExtra)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message= FALSE)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
```

```{r read-data, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
rmv_col <- function(x){
  read_csv(x) %>% 
  select(-`...1`)
}
unidata <- rmv_col("data/unidata.csv")
data_s <- rmv_col("data/stats.csv")
```
